info.name: AI Ticket Creator Backend API - Complete (Agent + Integration Refactor)
info.description:
Complete API collection for AI-powered ticket creation and management system with refactored multi-agent architecture and integration system.

## Features
- **Multi-Agent System**: Multiple agents per organization with embedded configuration
- **Agent Management**: CRUD operations with change history tracking
- **User authentication and organization management**
- **AI-powered ticket creation and management**
- **Chat Assistant**: Real-time AI chat with conversation management
- **File processing**: OCR, transcription, and agent context integration
- **Third-party integrations**: JIRA, Salesforce, etc.
- **Real-time WebSocket communications**

## Integration Architecture (REFACTORED)
The system now uses semantic integration categories:
1. **Category-Based System**: 7 functional categories (ticketing, crm, messaging, communication, project_management, code_repository, webhook)
2. **Platform Identification**: Separate platform_name field (jira, slack, salesforce, etc.)
3. **Automatic Status Management**: enabled=false automatically sets status=inactive
4. **ID-Based Routing**: Tickets use integration_id instead of integration_name
5. **Clean Architecture**: All deprecated IntegrationType enum removed

## Agent Architecture
The system supports:
1. **Multiple Agents per Organization**: No singleton constraints
2. **Embedded Configuration**: 20+ typed fields instead of JSON blob
3. **Change History Tracking**: Complete audit trail with rollback capabilities
4. **File Context Processing**: Up to 20 files per agent with text extraction
5. **Autonomous Task Processing**: Queue-based multi-channel operations
6. **Simplified API**: 6 CRUD + history endpoints

## Agent-Centric Chat System
The chat system is fully agent-centric with:
1. **Thread Management**: Create, read, update, delete threads per agent
2. **Message Handling**: Send messages and receive AI responses
3. **Context Awareness**: Agents use their configuration and file context
4. **Real-time Processing**: WebSocket support for live conversations
5. **Title Generation**: AI-powered thread title suggestions
6. **Search & Filtering**: Find threads by content, archive status, etc.

## Authentication
All protected endpoints require JWT authentication. Use the login flow to get access tokens.

## Base URL
Local Development: http://localhost:8000
